sentences.sContent: An odor of corruption hangs about him.
sentences.sContent_eng: An odor of corruption hangs about him.
sentences.sCn: 他浑身散发着腐化堕落的气味。

sentences.sContent: Note that I was the only one who got sick in that room and I was the only one who could smell the horrible odor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Note that I was the only one who got sick in that room and I was the only one who could smell the horrible odor.
sentences.sCn: 请注意，我是在那间房子住过的人中唯一一个生病的，同时也是唯一一个能够闻到那股令人作呕气味的人。

sentences.sContent: This bat is noted for its weird "hairdo", and for the strange odor males use to attract females during courtship.
sentences.sContent_eng: This bat is noted for its weird "hairdo", and for the strange odor males use to attract females during courtship.
sentences.sCn: 这种蝙蝠以其怪异的“发型”以及求偶期雄性为了吸引雌性所使用的奇怪气味而著称。

phrases.pCn: 臭气控制，气味控制；四氟化硅处理

words.tran: 臭的，散发气味的；芬芳的
洒香水于；给…添味，给…加臭味
